entry.name: extension
entry.title: extension method
entry.desc: Makes the element require a certain file extension.
entry.longdesc:
Returns true if the value ends with one of the specified file extensions. If nothing is specified, only images are allowed (png, jpeg, gif).
Works with text inputs.
Part of the additional-methods.js file

argument.name: extension
argument.desc: The allowed file extensions, seperated with "|" (or a comma, ","), defaults to "png|jpe?g|gif".

example.desc: Makes "field" required and ending with ".xls" or ".csv".
